接口 GeDBIT.mckoi.store.Area
的使用

  • 使用Area的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    GeDBIT.mckoi.store  

    • GeDBIT.mckoi.store中Area的使用

      返回Area的GeDBIT.mckoi.store中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Area Area.copyTo(Area destination, int size)
      Copies 'size' bytes from the current position of this Area to the destination Area (at the position set in the destination area).
      Area Area.get(byte[] buf, int off, int len) 
      Area Store.getArea(long pointer)
      Returns an Area object that can be used to manipulate an area allocated from the store.
      Area AbstractStore.getArea(long pointer) 
      Area Store.getFixedArea()
      Returns an Area object that represents the 64 byte fixed area as can be changed by the 'getFixedArea' and 'setFixedArea' methods.
      Area AbstractStore.getFixedArea() 
      Area Area.position(int position)
      Sets the position within the area and returns this object.
      Area Area.put(byte b) 
      Area Area.put(byte[] buf, int off, int len) 
      Area Area.putChar(char c) 
      Area Area.putInt(int i) 
      Area Area.putLong(long l) 
      Area Area.putShort(short s) 
      参数类型为Area的GeDBIT.mckoi.store中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Area Area.copyTo(Area destination, int size)
      Copies 'size' bytes from the current position of this Area to the destination Area (at the position set in the destination area).
